com.samsung.android.sdk.pen

Class Spen

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.samsung.android.sdk.pen.Spen
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    com.samsung.android.sdk.SsdkInterface

    public class Spen
extends Object
implements com.samsung.android.sdk.SsdkInterface
    This class represents the Pen package and provides the version number, version name, and initialization methods.
    Since:
    3.0.0

    • Field Summary

      Fields

      static int DEVICE_PEN
      Pen device type for isFeatureEnabled()
      static int SPEN_DYNAMIC_LIB_MODE
      Pen create mode
      static String SPEN_NATIVE_PACKAGE_NAME
      Pen native package name.
      static int SPEN_STATIC_LIB_MODE
      Pen create mode

      Spen() 

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      int getVersionCode()
      Get the version number of the Pen package.
      String getVersionName()
      Get the version name of the Pen package.
      void initialize(Context context)
      Initialize the Pen package with default values: maxCacheSize = 5 and createMode = SPEN_DYNAMIC_LIB_MODE Unable to initialize continuous two different modes
      void initialize(Context context, int maxCacheSize)
      Initialize the Pen package with max cache size with default createMode = SPEN_DYNAMIC_LIB_MODE Unable to initialize continuous two different modes
      void initialize(Context context, int maxCacheSize, int createMode)
      Initialize the Pen package with max cache size and create mode.
      void initialize(Context context, int maxCacheSize, int createMode, boolean isForce32BitMode)
      Initialize the Pen package with max cache size and create mode (with 64bit OS supporting) Unable to initialize continuous two different modes
      boolean isFeatureEnabled(int type)
      Check if the feature of type is available on the device.

      • isFeatureEnabled

        public boolean isFeatureEnabled(int type)
        Check if the feature of type is available on the device.
        Parameters:
        type - The type of feature.
        Throws:
        IllegalArgumentException - If the type is not DEVICE_PEN.
        Since:
        3.0.0

      • initialize

        public void initialize(Context context)
                throws SsdkUnsupportedException
        Initialize the Pen package with default values: maxCacheSize = 5 and createMode = SPEN_DYNAMIC_LIB_MODE Unable to initialize continuous two different modes
        Parameters:
        context - The context of the application.
        Throws:
        IllegalArgumentException - If the context is null.
        IllegalStateException - If initialization failure
        SsdkUnsupportedException
        Since:
        3.0.0

      • initialize

        public void initialize(Context context,
              int maxCacheSize)
                throws SsdkUnsupportedException
        Initialize the Pen package with max cache size with default createMode = SPEN_DYNAMIC_LIB_MODE Unable to initialize continuous two different modes
        Parameters:
        context - The context of the application.
        maxCacheSize - Max cache size in MB.
        Throws:
        SsdkUnsupportedException - Throw if one of reasons : Vendor is not supported ; SpenSdk apk version is low ; SpenSdk apk is not installed.
        IllegalArgumentException - If the context is null.
        IllegalStateException - If initialization failure
        Since:
        3.0.0

      • initialize

        public void initialize(Context context,
              int maxCacheSize,
              int createMode)
                throws SsdkUnsupportedException
        Initialize the Pen package with max cache size and create mode. Unable to initialize continuous two different modes
        Parameters:
        context - The context of the application.
        maxCacheSize - Max cache size in MB.
        createMode - Version of SpenSdk.(Dynamic/Static).
        Throws:
        SsdkUnsupportedException - Throw if one of reasons : Vendor is not supported ; SpenSdk apk version is low ; SpenSdk apk is not installed.
        IllegalArgumentException - If the context is null.
        IllegalStateException - If initialization failure
        Since:
        3.1.0

      • initialize

        public void initialize(Context context,
              int maxCacheSize,
              int createMode,
              boolean isForce32BitMode)
                throws SsdkUnsupportedException
        Initialize the Pen package with max cache size and create mode (with 64bit OS supporting) Unable to initialize continuous two different modes
        Parameters:
        context - The context of the application.
        maxCacheSize - Max cache size in MB.
        createMode - Version of SpenSdk.(Dynamic/Static).
        isForce32BitMode - If true, force SpenSDK to load 32bit library version
        Throws:
        SsdkUnsupportedException - Throw if one of reasons : Vendor is not supported ; SpenSdk apk version is low ; SpenSdk apk is not installed.
        IllegalArgumentException - If the context is null.
        IllegalStateException - If initialization failure
        Since:
        3.1.0
